stories.original_headline: What scientists found inside Titan was not what anyone expected
stories.original_summary: For years, scientists thought Saturn’s moon Titan hid a global ocean beneath its frozen surface. A new look at Cassini data now suggests something very different: a thick, slushy interior with pockets of liquid water rather than an open sea. A subtle delay in how Titan deforms under Saturn’s gravity
stories.fantasy_headline: The Chilly Moon of the Ringed Giant Hides a Slushy Heart.
stories.fantasy_story: For ages, star-gazing wizards believed Titan's Orb held a grand hidden sea beneath its icy shell. Now, ancient scrying records reveal a surprise: not an open ocean, but a deep, swirling frost with scattered pools of living water. The Ringed Giant's pull gently shapes its mysterious core.

stories.original_headline: Scientists unlocked a superconductor mystery under crushing pressure
stories.original_summary: Superconductors promise loss-free electricity, but most only work at extreme cold. Hydrogen-rich materials changed that—yet their inner workings remained hidden because they only exist under enormous pressure. Now, researchers have directly measured the superconducting state of hydrogen sulfide usin
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Perfect Magic Flow's Secret Under Vast Pressure.
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild seeks to create conduits of perfect arcane flow, but most only work in frozen wastes. New materials, imbued with the essence of mist, offered hope, yet their secrets remained locked away by mountains' crushing embrace. Now, arcane researchers have finally revealed the true nature of this perfect flow, hidden deep within foul-smelling crystals.

stories.original_summary: The holidays have a way of sneaking up on us. One minute you're trick-or-treating with your kids, and the next you're panic shopping in a Buc-ee's gift aisle. But it doesn't have to be that way. With the right cheat sheet, you can keep the holiday spirit high and stress levels low. Fortunately, we d
stories.fantasy_headline: The Grand Merchant's Scroll of Wondrous Festival Offerings.
stories.fantasy_story: The Winter Festival arrives swiftly, often catching folk unprepared! No need to panic or scramble for treasures. With this helpful scroll from the Grand Merchant's Guild, you can fill your coffers with joy and banish all woes. Discover the finest wares for every guild and family.

stories.original_headline: Sony’s XM5 headphones and the latest Kindle round out this week’s best deals
stories.original_summary: If you’re feeling the stress of having procrastinated on your holiday shopping — and you missed out during Black Friday and Cyber Monday — we’ve got you. We’ve found a variety of gadgets on sale that make for great gifts, many of which will ship in time for the holidays. One of the standouts is […]
stories.fantasy_headline: Clan Sonar's Whispering Shells and Lore-Slates Now at Great Value.
stories.fantasy_story: Did you miss the Festival of Shadows or the Great Bazaar Day for finding treasures? Fear not, for the Merchants' Guild has unearthed new wonders! Clan Sonar's Whispering Ear-shells and the Glimmering Lore-Slate of Endless Tales are offered at reduced prices. These wondrous artifacts make perfect gifts for the upcoming Solstice celebrations!
